item.description:
Let's all meet up for dinner/drinks at Orleans in Davis Sq. We've got a great group, it's about time we planned more meetings in the Cambridge/Somerville neighborhood.

This is the first meet-up that Winfield is taking charge of, so you should have pity on his poor organizational and social skills.

We will go to Orleans, we will have fun meeting like minded people, and we will enjoy a few choice beverages.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Winfield and Sara at Orleans, around 7pm.
item.why: The Boston Atheists are a loosely knit group of people who all share some discontent with the religous and cultural status quo. We've all rejected the easy answers for very different reasons, but somehow we all find common ground.
item.name: Atheists @ Orleans
